title: Patcher/Launcher fault. Please help if possible :)
body:
Every update, without fail results in having to uninstall, reinstall, repeat until the launcher works properly. 
The main issue is that the launcher (after completing the updates etc) wont allow me to get to the login screen.
The ping after the completed update and eula pop up. The launcher button makes the right noise, nothing happens after that. 
Repair doesnt work when clicked either. 
I have gone though many forums and tried many "fixes" but am yet to find a final fix. 
Any help would be great thankyou in advance

replies.body: What OS are you on? Have you tried general maintenance on it, like defrag, malware scans and updates?
up to date, windows 7, cant defrag an ssd, and repairs wont work on client

Including updates to your graphics drivers and DirectX itself? You might want to read [this](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq10).

Have you tried running it in admin mode? If that's the case that fixes it, set your shortcut to the launcher to redirect to the admin version of launcher.exe instead of just the standard one.

If the repair isn't working (as in, you get an error when you attempt to repair) then it could mean that an external program is actively opening and editing files in League's program folder as it's running. Do you have any anti-virus or cleaner running in the background which you could disable until the patcher is completely finished and you've logged in?

If that hasn't worked, try going into your "Internet Options" (searchable from the Control Panel), reset everything back to their defaults, and then set the security level for the internet to "Medium-Low".

If that doesn't work, get back to me.

Best of luck.
You are out of lick sir, i have had this problem for about 2 months and riot hasnt given me any help
yea ive had this issue for a very long time....

I have found that spamming the launch button from startup as admin has a 6/10 chance of launching the game. But there is only so much my finger can spam in one evening (limits me playing kat and fiora to my full mashing potential).
